name: Skate Granpa
description:
Team Name - Blurry

Controls - 

Left Thumbstick - Movement 

Right Thumbstick - Camera 

Right Bumper - Brake 

A - Jump 

X - Crouch 

B - Fart/ Launch forward

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.
